tr.td: Courses
Search for a course?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find a Course.
Browse the course catalog?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Browse Course Catalog.
Modify a course?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find a Course to locate the course you want to modify. Once viewing the course, use the Course Actions menu to select Propose Course Modification.
Retire a course?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find a Course. Once viewing the course, use the Course Actions menu to select Retire Course (Authorized users only).
View a course's history or compare two versions of a course?
Under the Find heading, locate and click Find a Course to locate the course you want to view. Once viewing the course, you can click the Version History link near the course title.
Programs
Search for a program?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find Academic Programs.
Browse the program inventory?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Browse Academic Programs.
Create a program?
Under the Create... heading, locate and click Create an Academic Program (Authorized users only).
Modify a program?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find Academic Programs to locate the program you want to modify. Once viewing the program, use the Program Actions menu to select Modify Program.
Proposed Curriculum
Check the status of my proposal?
Click My Actionlist near the top of the page. At the Actionlist, click Outbox to find proposals you've submitted and their associated status.
See what proposals are in review?
Under the Find... heading, locate and click Find a Course Proposal or Find a Program Proposal link. Leave the search criteria blank and click the Search button to see a list of all proposals.
Approve or reject a course proposal?
Click My Actionlist near the top of the page. At the Actionlist, view a proposal by clicking the Id number. Once viewing the proposal, use the Proposal Actions menu to approve or reject the proposal.
Other Curriculum Tools
View a course set or build a new one?
Under the Management Tools heading, click Course Set Management.
View, build, or delete learning objective categories?
Under the Management Tools heading, click Learning Objective Categories.
Analyze curriculum dependencies for a course?
Under the Management Tools heading, click Dependency Analysis.
